DOC.brief_summary: In this single-site, randomized, controlled and double-blind clinical trial, the investigators evaluate the effect of sodium bicarbonate on prevention of acute kidney injury in high risk patients undergoing off pump coronary bypass surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Sodium Bicarbonate on Prevention of Acute Kidney Injury in High Risk Patients Undergoing Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass (OPCAB)
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 20 years scheduled for elective coronary artery bypass grafting. preoperative estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) : 30 ~ 89 % LVEF < 35% NYHA class III or IV age > 70 DM reoperation acute renal impairment patients who receive dialysis patients who receive steroid ( > 10mg/day prednisolon or equivalent) hemoalkalosis hypernatremia pulmonary edema Hemoglobin < 10 mg/dL
